scripts.pact:consumer: npm run clean:pacts && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest src/consumer/consumer.pact.test.js
scripts.pact:consumer:bad: npm run clean:pacts && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest src/consumer/consumer.pact.bad.test.js
scripts.demo:bad:publish: cross-env-shell BRANCH=demo-bad CONSUMER_VERSION_SUFFIX=bad "npm run pact:consumer:bad && npm run pact:publish"
scripts.demo:bad:verify: cross-env PROVIDER_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:9010 CONSUMER_BRANCH=demo-bad PROVIDER_BRANCH=main npm run pact:verify
scripts.demo:good:publish: cross-env-shell BRANCH=main CONSUMER_VERSION_SUFFIX=good "npm run pact:consumer && npm run pact:publish"
scripts.demo:good:verify: cross-env PROVIDER_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:9010 CONSUMER_BRANCH=main PROVIDER_BRANCH=main npm run pact:verify
